name: Scott G
text: We ended up here because the place we wanted to go, in Downtown Golden, had a lengthy wait and we were really hungry. Pretty typical of the Pizza Hut experience, you either like their pizza or you don't. We had the Taco Pizza and liked it. …More

text: Love it here they have a salad bar and they are always super friendly

name: Zach Ford
text: The staff was quick and friendly. The food was fresh. I have a mental picture of Pizza Hut being kinda old and run down with food reflecting but this one is totally up to date and clean. Great atmosphere. I’d be tempted to bring my laptop in and do some work considering how nice this place was.

name: Savannah Ullrich
text: New location is nice inside, perhaps a little cold but I understand there's a kitchen. The pizza is exactly what you expect and the staff has been pleasant. The express lunch is a fantastic deal!

name: Peyton Rose
text: The staff at this location really set it apart from most Pizza Hut locations I've been to. They're very nice. They have amazing bread sticks. The location is great. Conveniently located on South Golden Rd. I would highly recommend this particular Pizza Hut because of the staff. It's cozy as well, which always helps!

text: Their lunch buffet is a good place for a quick lunch. Salad bar is not expansive but quite adequate for lunch. Pizza selection can be hit or miss based on timing, but usually adequate selection for an economical lunch. Nice place for small groups to meet for lunch.
